definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: One way to combat these issues is to use Instancing and Texture Arrays.
sentences.chinese: 解决该问题的一个方法是采用实例和纹理数组。

sentences.english: Again determined to rule out a reaction to textures, the neurologists tested her with colored light.
sentences.chinese: 再次决心排除反应纹理，神经学家测试与彩色光她。

sentences.english: Texture a watercolor sky when the paint is still wet.
sentences.chinese: 纹理水彩颜料时，天空仍是湿的。

sentences.english: Draw the camera textured with selection wireframe and no background clearing.
sentences.chinese: 绘制带纹理的相机，带有选择线框和无背景清除。

sentences.english: Hide the texture layer and select the retouching one.
sentences.chinese: 隐藏的纹理层，并选择一个修饰。

sentences.english: This method can be simply applied to GPU-based 3D texture ray-casting algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 并结合基于3D纹理的GPU光线投射算法完成绘制。

sentences.english: Draw textured with overlaid lightmap resolution grid.
sentences.chinese: 绘制带有覆盖光照贴图分辨率网格纹理。

sentences.english: The texture projection maps the colors of the image to the geometry.
sentences.chinese: 纹理贴图会把图像的颜色直接投影在几何体上。

sentences.english: All three textures were carefully made in a photorealistic style.
sentences.chinese: 所有这三个纹理被精心制作的照片风格。

sentences.english: Finally, texture-based algorithm is an overview of the computer analysis of handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 最后是对基于纹理的计算机笔迹算法的分析。

sentences.english: I then texture the styrofoam with a couple of small rocks.
sentences.chinese: 然后我纹理与小岩夫妇的发泡胶。

sentences.english: For minification only, in addition to the above two choices, you can also choose from.
sentences.chinese: 缩小纹理，除了上面两个选择以外，还可以设置为。

sentences.english: Basically, you should be making a highlight on our image to give it a bit more texture.
sentences.chinese: 基本上你应该在图像上做高亮设置，显得更多的纹理。

sentences.english: The grain direction must go from head to tail.
sentences.chinese: 纸张的纹理必须垂直地从头顺到尾。

sentences.english: You will now successfully see your texture merged with the previous retouching.
sentences.chinese: 您现在看到您的成功合并后的纹理与以前的修饰。

sentences.english: Streaks of hair fined out using smudge tool and small hard brushes.
sentences.chinese: 用模糊工具和小的硬笔刷来刻画头发的纹理。

definition: veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
